overview: Buttman and Dario get lost in the country outside of London.  They meet a couple of local girls who challenge even Dario.  Later, Buttman visits a salon to get his hair cut and discovers it's run by the famous model Linzi Drew.  He discovers one of the stylists there is Nici Sterling, and she's interested in more than just cutting hair.  Back in the country, Buttman's car breaks down, but he meets a helpful couple who help him out in more ways than one.
title: Buttman's Bouncing British Babes
